Class UserProfileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user.UserProfileController

  • public class UserProfileController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for UserProfile.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commitChanges()
      WARNING: This will hit the network! Commits the current state of the model to the datamanager, ie the local cache and either the remote queue or the remote elasticsearch.
      TextWatcher getCityWatcher()
      This should be called in the view, for the purpose of attaching the Controller's TextWatcher to the view's EditText widget.

      • setPhone

        public void setPhone(java.lang.String phone)
        Call me from the View (or indirectly via TextWatcher) to set the UserProfile's phone number
        Parameters:
        phone - the new phone number to set.

      • setCity

        public void setCity(java.lang.String city)
        Call me from the View (or indirectly via TextWatcher) to set the UserProfile's city.
        Parameters:
        city - the new city to set.

      • setEmail

        public void setEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Call me from the View (or indirectly via TextWatcher) to set the UserProfile's email address. If the new email is invalid, the model will not be updated.
        Parameters:
        email - the new email to set.

      • commitChanges

        public void commitChanges()
        WARNING: This will hit the network! Commits the current state of the model to the datamanager, ie the local cache and either the remote queue or the remote elasticsearch. This should be called by the view only when the user has finished entering input and navigates away from the editing screen. Otherwise, there would be too many network/datamanager calls.

      • isEmailInValid

        public boolean isEmailInValid(java.lang.String email)
        Check to see if an email matches the valid syntax.
        Parameters:
        email - email that will be validated
        Returns:
        true == valid, false == invalid

      • getCityWatcher

        public TextWatcher getCityWatcher()
        This should be called in the view, for the purpose of attaching the Controller's TextWatcher to the view's EditText widget.
        Returns:
        a TextWatcher that updates the city.

      • getPhoneWatcher

        public TextWatcher getPhoneWatcher()
        This should be called in the view, for the purpose of attaching the Controller's TextWatcher to the view's EditText widget.
        Returns:
        a TextWatcher that updates the phone number.

      • getEmailWatcher

        public TextWatcher getEmailWatcher()
        This should be called in the view, for the purpose of attaching the Controller's TextWatcher to the view's EditText widget.
        Returns:
        a TextWatcher that updates the email.
